body_html: I had this exact problem. I went to the TensorFlow GPU Support page and noticed that there is a required path variable I was missing C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0\bin After adding that path it worked perfectly for me.

body: I had this exact problem. I went to the TensorFlow GPU Support page and noticed that there is a required path variable I was missing `C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v9.0\bin` After adding that path it worked perfectly for me.
